headline: Dividend Alert: Albemarle (ALB) Rises Ahead of Earnings
summary: We recently published Rally Alert: 10 Stocks That Just Made Investors Richer. Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) is one of the best-performing stocks on Thursday. Albemarle grew its share prices by 6.84 percent on Thursday to close at $84.18 apiece as investors repositioned portfolios ahead of the release of its second quarter earnings results. According to the company, […]
